altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en: Hopeless pushover Iruma Suzuki has found himself in a devil of a predicament… His trashy parents have sold off his soul, and he now has to live and attend school in the Netherworld. But with his unique survival skills and doting demon grandfather’s support, Iruma will surely make it through this hellish experience. He’ll just need to subjugate rival classmates, summon familiars, and more, all while never revealing that he’s human… Easy as *aleph, bet, gimel*, right?
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

title.en: The Seven Deadly Sins: Four Knights of the Apocalypse

altTitles.tr: Yedi Ölümcül Günah: Mahşerin Dört Şövalyesi

description.en: Percival, a kind boy, lives with his grandfather in a remote place called "God's Finger". However, the world will not allow him to live in peace. An encounter with a mysterious knight changes their fate, and a shocking secret is revealed. The boy sets out on an endless journey. Whether you know "The Seven Deadly Sins" or not, you can still enjoy it! The world's most awaited adventure fantasy!
description.es:
La profecía se ha cumplido. "En un futuro no muy lejano, habrá cuatro caballeros sagrados que destruirán el mundo. Son los Cuatro Jinetes del Apocalipsis.""
Los santos caballeros que juraron fidelidad al rey Arturo estaban ansiosos por cortar el mal de raíz. Las consecuencias de estos acontecimientos llegan hasta la frontera... y sacuden el destino de un niño. Un niño que da el primer paso como le dice su corazón. ¿Qué le espera: sueños, esperanzas, gloria o pecado? La fantasía heroica del pasado y del presente, ¡el inicio!
description.fr: Percival vit seul avec son grand-père Bargis, au sommet d’une haute montagne nommée le “Doigt divin”. Il y mène une vie heureuse, préservé du monde extérieur. Mais le jour de ses 16 ans, son destin bascule : un mystérieux guerrier à l’armure rouge s’en prend violemment à lui et à son grand-père. En effet, ce Chevalier sacré de Camelot est chargé d’éliminer quiconque s’apparenterait aux “Four Knights of the Apocalypse”, un groupe de cavaliers qui, d’après la prophétie, apparaîtra pour renverser le roi Arthur… Laissé pour mort, Percival survit à ses blessures et décide de partir en quête de vengeance, et d’aventures !
description.ja:
『七つの大罪』正統続編！ 全世界待望の冒険ファンタジー!!

予言は示された。「遠くない未来、世界を滅ぼす四人の聖騎士が現れる。――その名を〈黙示録の四騎士〉」。厄災の芽を摘まんと色めき立つは、アーサー王に忠誠を誓いし一騎当千の聖騎士たち。その余波は、遠く辺境にまで及び……、一人の少年の運命を揺るがす！ 己が心の命ずるまま、一歩を踏み出す少年。その前途に待つは、夢か希望か栄光か罪か。古今無双のヒロイック・ファンタジー、開幕!!
description.pt: A profecia indicava que num futuro não muito distante, aparecerão quatro cavaleiros sagrados que destruirão o mundo: São os Quatro Cavaleiros do Apocalipse. Os quatro cavaleiros sagrados, que juraram fidelidade ao Rei Artur, estão muito animados para cortar esta calamidade pela raiz. As consequências chegam até à fronteira e abalam o destino de um rapaz, ......! Um rapaz dá um passo em frente como manda o seu coração. O que o espera é um sonho, uma esperança, glória ou pecado. Começa uma fantasia heróica dos mundos antigo e moderno!
description.tr: Nazik bir çocuk olan Percival, büyükbabasıyla birlikte "Tanrı'nın Parmağı" adlı uzak bir yerde yaşıyor. Ancak dünya onun barış içinde yaşamasına izin vermeyecektir. Gizemli bir şövalyeyle karşılaşmaları kaderlerini değiştirir ve şok edici bir sır ortaya çıkar. Çocuk sonsuz bir yolculuğa çıkar. "Yedi Ölümcül Günah"ı bilseniz de bilmeseniz de tadını çıkarabilirsiniz! Dünyanın en çok beklenen macera fantezisi!
description.uk: Історія є продовженням манги "Сім Смертних гріхів". Початок манги знайомить нас з Персівалем - шістнадцятирічний хлопець з ширяючого острова «Палець бога», який після певних подій вирушає в подорож чарівним королівством під назвою Британія.
description.es-la: Percival, un niño bondadoso, vive con su abuelo en un lugar remoto llamado "El dedo de Dios". Sin embargo, el mundo no le permite vivir en paz. Un encuentro con un misterioso caballero cambia su destino, y se revela un impactante secreto. El niño emprende un viaje interminable. Tanto si conoce "Los siete pecados capitales" como si no, ¡podrá disfrutar de él! ¡La fantasía de aventuras más esperada del mundo!
description.pt-br: Percival, um menino bem-humorado, vive com seu avô num lugar remoto chamado “O Dedo de Deus”. No entanto, o mundo não permite que ele viva em paz. Um encontro com um misterioso cavaleiro muda seu destino, e um segredo chocante é revelado. O menino embarca numa jornada sem fim.

description.en: A romantic comedy centered around "The School Prince" bringing the tense conflict of young boys and girls to the breaking point!

description.ja: 一人暮らしの高校生・秋原晴人はある日、同級生の超美少女・水琴玲衣と同棲することに!!「氷の女神」の異名を持つ玲衣は冷たい態度をとるが、献身的に接する晴人に段々とベタ甘でポンコツに…!?

description.en:
Dennosuke Uchimura is a simple Salaryman, who one day is run over by an elderly lady on a scooter and left in the street to die. When he regained consciousness he discovers he was summoned to another world by the Demon King himself, who offers him a position as one of his Four Heavenly Kings. 

Can Dennosuke survive as a servant of the Demon King, and meet his expectations?

My Galpals are Cumming of Age

altTitles.en: My Galpal Wants An Adult Understanding
My Girl Friend Wants An Adult Understanding

description.en:
20-year-old Sawatari Tatsurou is a male college student. While others around him are rejoicing in the springtime of their youth, he's enjoying his solitary life to the fullest. He has a noble hobby. Which is… appreciating lewd vide*s. “I don't need a girlfriend. Because I have AVs”. A fulfilling everyday where he continuously releases his male desires with his exceptional AV love…… However one day, his classmate and gal galpal Kaniko Eimi witnesses him cranking it at his place!

Then, she says something shocking to Tatsurou, who thinks the world is ending.

“I-is it fine if I watch the AV together with you……?”

Watch it together with your innocent galpal with an immoral atmosphere! A vid-life story where male desires are laid bare with a gal!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/watch/mg878860)

altTitles.th: AOASHI แข้งเด็กหัวใจนักสู้

description.de: Aoi Ashito ist ein Mittelschüler im dritten Jahr aus Ehime. Hinter seinem rohen Spiel verbirgt sich sein immenses Talent, aber Ashito erleidet wegen seiner allzu geradlinigen Persönlichkeit einen großen Rückschlag. Der Manager der Jugendmannschaft des J1-Clubs Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, erscheint vor Ashito. Fukuda sieht Ashitos grenzenloses Potenzial und lädt ihn ein, an den Probespielen seines Teams in Tokio teilzunehmen. Die Geschichte des Jungen, der den Fußball in Japan revolutionieren wird, beginnt sich schnell zu entfalten.
description.en:
Aoi Ashito is a third year middle school student from Ehime. Behind his raw game hides his immense talent 
but Ashito suffers a huge setback because of his overly straightforward personality. 
One day the youth team manager of J1 club Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, appears in front of him. 
Fukuda sees his limitless potential and invites him to take part in his team's tryouts in Tokyo. 
The story of the boy who will revolutionize football in Japan rapidly begins to unfold.  
  
---
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2019**
description.ru: Ашито Аой, ученик третьего класса средней школы из префектуры Эхиме, встречает тренера «Молодежной лиги J» Фукуду Тацую. Несмотря на свою грубость, Ашито обладает таким удивительным потенциалом, что тренер Фукуда приглашает его принять участие в отборочных тестах своей команды в Токио. Взгляните на историю мальчика, который совершит революцию в японском футболе.
description.tr: Aoi Ashito Ehime'de ortaokul 3. sınıfa giden bir öğrencidir. Bir gün karşısına J1 Ligi kulübü Tokyo City Esperion'un altyapı takımı menajeri Fukuda Tetsuya çıkar. Fukuda Aoi'nin sonsuz potansiyelini farkeder ve onu Tokyo'daki altyapı seçmelerine davet eder. Böylece Japon futbolunda devrim yapacak çocuğun hikayesi başlar.
description.pt-br: Ashito Aoi, um estudante do terceiro ano do ensino médio de Ehime, conhece Fukuda Tatsuya, um treinador da "J Youth League". Mesmo que ainda tenha uma personalidade forte, Ashito tem um incrível potêncial que o fez ser convidado pelo treinador Fukuda para participar da seleção de sua equipe em Tóquio. A história do garoto que vai revolucionar o futebol no Japão vai começar.

description.en: The beloved characters of Mairimashita! Iruma-kun star in this Mafia-based spinoff! Young Iruma saves an injured mob boss from death... and then becomes his grandson!?
description.ja: 暴力や犯罪は当たり前の貧民街-スラム-で育った心優しい少年・イルマ。瀕死状態で倒れていた、マフィア組織【バビル】のドン・サリバンを助けたことで、イルマの運命の歯車が動き出す！ マフィア組織【バビル】を中心に巻き起こる、マフィア・アクションコメディ！
description.vi: Spin-Off của tác phẩm"Mairimashita! Iruma-kun" theo hướng What-If, thế giới của tác phẩm lần này sẽ xoay quanh việc các nhân vật sẽ sống trong thế giới của các Mafia
description.es-la: ¡Un spin-off oficial de Mairimashita! Iruma-kun, en un universo alternativo en el que Iruma se convierte en un destacado miembro de la mafia. A pesar de tener sólo cinco años, Iruma ha visto muchas cosas como niño de la calle... ¡la más reciente, a un anciano desangrándose justo delante de donde vive! Como buen chico, Iruma se dedica a curar al anciano y no le da importancia. Sin embargo, cuando el anciano regresa de repente, se revela como Don Sullivan, ¡jefe de la organización clandestina conocida como Babyls! Se ofrece a adoptar a Iruma como su nieto, una oferta que Iruma se ve incapaz de rechazar...
description.pt-br: Os amados personagens de Mairimashita! Iruma-kun estrela neste spinoff baseado na máfia! O jovem Iruma salva um chefe da máfia ferido da morte... e então se torna seu neto!?

description.en:
Inept at dealing with people, Higawa Koyuki maintains a wall between herself and others. She spends her time in highschool away from others, all alone. At least until she encounters Amamiya Minato who keeps closing the distance between them for some reason?!

The aloof Koyuki, the popular Miki, the boundary-less Minato, and the easygoing and kind basketball team member, Youta. This is the story of these somewhat complicated four, and their tantalizing, bumbling youth!

While you were admiring the girl in the next seat, she might be eyeing you up, too…? A new kind of “neighborly” short-form pure love comedy!

(Source: Sunday Webry, translated)
description.ja: 主人公の池沢くんは、同じクラスの美少女・江口さんのことを「そういう目」で見ている。しかし実は、江口さんも「そういう目」で池沢くんのことを見ていて！？チラ見えする筋肉、汗ばむ肌、髪の香り…互いに興味津々な2人の「下心」から始まる純愛ラブコメ！好きな人のなら、臭いも汗も×××も…全部好き。

description.en: Fifty years after the war with the aliens... danger emerges... from within a young girl! Ichigaya Sumire, age 18, works at a "space pest" extermination company to pay off the debts her father left behind. But one day, her life is turned upside down when she's abducted by a UFO!
description.ja:
ガール・ミーツ・エイリアン！

エイリアンと戦争から50年――

市ヶ谷スミレ、18歳。父親の残した借金返済のため宇宙害蟲駆除会社に勤務する日々。そんなスミレの日常が、UFOにさらわれたことで一変する…！頭の中で聞こえる何者かの声…襲いかかる宇宙害獣…さらには軍事企業からも狙われて――！？

title.en: The Transfer Student Is a Yuki-Onna...!!

altTitles.en: Welcome to the "Outcasts' Guild" ~The Incompetent S-Rank Parties Keep Expelling Competent Party Members, so I'm Creating the Strongest Guild by Recruiting the Weakest

altTitles.ja: ようこそ『追放者ギルド』へ ～無能なＳランクパーティがどんどん有能な冒険者を追放するので、最弱を集めて最強ギルドを創ります～
Youkoso "Tsuihousha Guild" e ~Munou na S Rank Party ga Dondon Yuunou na Boukensha wo Tsuihou surunode, Saijaku wo Atsumete Saikyou Guild wo Tsukurimasu~

description.en:
High-rank parties chasing out their own party members because of their low stats has recently become a common trend. A young man named Aizen, feeling dissatisfied about the current status supremacism, has decided to gather the outcats who were expelled due their low stats, and establish his own guild together with them.

「Are you kicking them out of your party? I'm going to recruit them then!」

A person's abilities isn't limited to their stats alone
The "weak" will bloom and become "strong" using of their latent abilites, their "hidden skill"!

This is the start of an outcast revolution fantasy story!!

Shizuka Kamishiro is 21 years old, with no money, no friends, and no girlfriend. He was stuck at home, after he got scammed by a college acquaintance who wasn't even really a friend, when he heard a loud gasp from his neighbor, a college girl who was fucking her boyfriend while he's lying on his mattress suffering all alone. The absurd difference in circumstances drove him crazy, and he punched the wall so hard that he broke through. The neighbors came over, and her boyfriend beat him almost senseless. As despair and dark emotions overwhelmed him, a messenger from the demon world appeared. Immediately, the boyfriend's head flew off, and the demon told him, "So, go ahead and XXX this girl."

When a young man gains supernatural powers, an immoral "erotic x grotesque" game begins!

(Source: Futabasha, translated)
description.ja:
金なし、彼女なし、友達なしの苦学生・神城静21歳。



同じ大学で友達とも呼べない知り合いに勧められた投資詐欺に引っかかり、自宅で意気消沈していると、隣人の女子大生の大きな喘ぎ声が聞こえてくる。



布団にくるまり苦しむ自分と、彼氏とハッスルしている女子大生。そのあまりに理不尽な違いに思わず発狂し、勢いそのままに壁パンをかましたところ壁が貫通。すると、女子大生とその彼氏が乗り込んできて半殺しにされる。



絶望を通り越し、暗黒の感情が充満したその時、目の前に魔界からの使者が現れる。一瞬にして、彼氏の首が飛び、そして使者はこう告げるーー。


「その女、×××しなよ」超絶画力で紡ぐ“エロ×グロ“の男子校ノリ全開の不謹慎エンターテインメント！

altTitles.ja: アンデッドアンラック

description.en:
As an UNLUCKY girl prepares to face her death, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Vicious, violent and buck naked! An unprecedented picaresque hero appears in Shonen Jump!  
  
- Winner of the 2020 Tsugimanga award.
description.th: อันเดดที่ใฝ่หาความตายปรากฎตัวขึ้นต่อหน้าอันลัคที่ตั้งใจจะตาย...!? ฮีโร่วายร้ายที่ทั้งร้าย！โหด! โป๊! แบบที่คุณไม่เคยเห็นมาก่อน ตีพิมพ์แล้วในจัมป์วันนี้!
description.pt-br:
Enquanto uma garota Azarada se prepara para enfrentar sua morte, um MORTO-VIVO que deseja desesperadamente morrer aparece diante dela! Vicioso, violento e nu! Um herói pitoresco inédito aparece na Shonen Jump!

Vencedor do prêmio Tsugimanga 2020.

title.en: Miss Wolf and Her Fox Sister

altTitles.zh: 狼小姐和她的狐狸妹妹

altTitles.zh-ro: Lang Xiaojie He Ta De Huli Meimei

description.en: [Savage Wolf X Cunning Fox] In the modern therianthrope world, everyone respects the law of the jungle where the strong prey on the weak. Twenty-year-old Yu Wenxi, as a gray wolf therianthrope, stands at the top of the food chain. She has made a name for herself with her fists. She is violent and volatile, always looking down on the weak. Until one day, when her stepsister left a fox cub with her. From then on, the wild wolf turned into a good big dog. She vowed to raise the crybaby cub, train it into a model student, and give it the best that life has to offer. However, the little fox is hiding a wicked heart under the guise of a good girl...

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Tune In to the Midnight Heart

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

description.en:
"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people?
___
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!! アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.ru:
«Пока я лежал на кровати посреди ночи в полном одиночестве, твой голос был моим единственным утешением. Я хочу поговорить с тобой ещё раз. И должен кое-что тебе сказать».

Ямабуки Арису, ученик второго класса старшей школы, ищет бывшую ведущую радио-стримов «Аполло», не зная ни её лица, ни имени. Однако, однажды он понимает, что Аполло скрывается среди участниц клуба радиовещания в его школе. Четыре красавицы оттуда мечтают получить работу, связанную с голосом. Но которая из них — Аполло? И что станет с их мечтами? Милый ромком о тяжёлом труде и успехе начинается!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

description.en:
Katou Narumi (19) suffers from Zonapha Syndrome, a rare ailment that stops his breathing unless he makes people laugh. He's been forced to abandon his training in Chinese kenpo and return to Japan, where he now works as a clown. The only problem: he's not very funny.  
  
One day he meets Saiga Masaru (11), the recent inheritor of a huge fortune, who gives him the first laugh he's gotten all day. When he realizes Masaru is being pursued by assassins, he steps in to protect the boy, only to discover that instead of conventional weapons, the assassins wield huge, eerie puppets. They soon encounter the mysterious Shirogane (age unknown), who controls a puppet of her own, and claims she was sent from France by Masaru's late grandfather to protect him.  
  
Their paths intertwine and diverge, splitting into two stories: Karakuri and Circus, puppets and performers, tears and laughter. The strange circus of living dolls that spreads Zonapha Syndrome, the human puppets known collectively as the Shirogane, and the puppeteers whose undying grudge set in motion both sides of this performance.
description.es-la:
Katou Narumi (19 años) sufre el síndrome de Zonapha, una rara dolencia que le impide respirar a menos que haga reír a la gente. Se ha visto obligado a abandonar su entrenamiento en kenpo chino y a regresar a Japón, donde ahora trabaja como payaso. El único problema: no es muy divertido.  
  
Un día conoce a Saiga Masaru (11), el reciente heredero de una enorme fortuna, que le hace reír por primera vez en todo el día. Cuando se da cuenta de que Masaru es perseguido por unos asesinos, interviene para proteger al chico, sólo para descubrir que, en lugar de armas convencionales, los asesinos empuñan enormes y espeluznantes marionetas. Pronto se encuentran con la misteriosa Shirogane (de edad desconocida), que controla una marioneta propia y afirma que fue enviada desde Francia por el difunto abuelo de Masaru para protegerlo.  
  
Sus caminos se entrelazan y divergen, dividiéndose en dos historias: Karakuri y el Circo, marionetas y artistas, lágrimas y risas. El extraño circo de muñecos vivientes que propaga el síndrome de Zonapha, las marionetas humanas conocidas colectivamente como los Shirogane, y los titiriteros cuyo rencor imperecedero puso en marcha las dos partes de este espectáculo.

description.en: Velota Rosebet, the admired saint of the Lunhardt Empire, is marked by a terrible curse: she must receive the essence of a man once a month. Her secret is revealed during a full moon night by Saiden Blackwood, the leader of the order of holy knights, who has harbored a deep love for her. Overcome by anger towards the curse, Saiden decides to take on the task of freeing her. Will he be able to fulfill his oath and restore Velota's freedom?

title.en: Tatsumigahara-san no Ai Kara wa Nigerarenai

altTitles.ja: 辰巳ヶ原さんの愛からは逃げられない

altTitles.en: You Can't Escape from Tatsumigahara-san's Love

altTitles.zh: 无法逃离辰巳原小姐的爱

altTitles.zh-hk: 無法逃離辰巳原桑的愛

altTitles.pt-br: Não pode escapar do amor de Tatsumigahara

altTitles.es-la: No puedo escapar del amor de Tatsumigahara

altTitles.vi: Không thể thoát khỏi tình yêu của Tatsumigahra

description.en: At a party, Mondo, a typical college student, meets Tatsumigahara Aoi, a well-known beauty. But after having a few drinks with her, he passes out and wakes up chained in Aoi's home. Even though Aoi looks after Mondo in every way (including in explicit ways), Mondo tries to flee from her home. The outcome is uncertain.
description.ja: 普通の大学生・門戸はある日、大学の飲み会で地雷系美女・辰巳ヶ原碧と出会い、気づけば碧の家に監禁されていた――!!? 碧からあらゆるお世話（エッ●なことも含む）をされ至れり尽くせりな状況も、なんとか碧の家からの脱出を試みようとする門戸。しかし、彼を監禁していたのは5人姉妹「長女 茜」「次女 碧」「三女 翠」「四女 コウ」「五女 桃」だった――。全員地雷な5人姉妹の寵愛を受ける門戸は、欲に溺れるか、外に出て自由を得るか…。
description.es-la:
Un día Mondo, un estudiante universitario completamente normal, conoce a la popular belleza Tatsumigahara Aoi en una fiesta. Pero luego de par de copas con ella, cae inconsciente y él despierta encerrado en la casa de Aoi.

Mondo intenta escapar de la casa de Aoi, a pesar de que Aoi cuida de él de todas las formas posibles. (incluyendo cosas sexualmente explícitas) ¿Cuál será su destino?

title.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 杀死男主然后成为女魔头

altTitles.ru: Убить главного героя, чтобы стать злодейкой

altTitles.zh-ro: Sha Si Nan Zhu Ranhou Chengwei Nv Mo Tou
Shā Sǐ Nán Zhǔ Ránhòu Chéngwéi Nǚ Mó Tóu

altTitles.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Demoness

altTitles.vi: Giết Chết Nam Chính, Ta Trở Thành Nữ Ma Đầu.

altTitles.ja: Lv99の悪女がLv1の主人公を育てます

altTitles.ja-ro: Lv99 no Akujo ga Lv1 no Shujinkou wo Sodatemasu

description.en:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”

altTitles.ja: リィンカーネーションの花弁

description.en: Striving for talent, Senji Touya tries everything he can so he can find it. Kendou, dancing, swimming, basketball, soccer, chess… anything he tries, he fails to exceed it. One day, his classmate, Haito, came to school for once in a long time. Senji refers to her as someone who "has it" or someone who has talent. Later on, he found out that she isn't just someone who has talent, but someone who "took" the talent of herself in her past life. And, those who "took" the talent from their past lives, are also known as "Returners"…
description.vi: Cố gắng tìm kiếm tài năng, Senji Touya thử mọi thứ có thể để tìm ra nó. Kiếm đạo, nhảy múa, bơi lội, bóng rổ, bóng đá, cờ vua… bất cứ thứ gì cậu thử, cậu đều không thể vượt trội. Một ngày nọ, cô bạn cùng lớp của cậu, Haito, tới trường sau một thời gian dài vắng mặt. Senji coi cô là người "có nó" – một người có tài năng. Sau đó, cậu phát hiện ra rằng cô không chỉ là một người có tài năng mà còn là người đã "lấy" tài năng của mình từ kiếp trước. Và, những người "lấy" tài năng từ kiếp trước của họ còn được gọi là "Những Kẻ Trở Lại"…
description.pt-br: Na busca por um talento só seu, Senji Touya tenta de tudo para encontrá-lo. Kendou, dança, natação, basquete, futebol, xadrez… em tudo o que ele tenta, ele não consegue se destacar. Um dia, sua colega de classe, Haito, vem à escola pela primeira vez em muito tempo. Senji se refere a ela como alguém que “possui algo” ou alguém que tem um verdadeiro talento. Mais tarde, ele descobriu que ela não é apenas alguém que tem talento, mas alguém que “conseguiu” o talento de si mesma através de sua vida passada. E, aqueles que “conseguem” o talento de suas vidas passadas, também são conhecidos como “Reencarnados” …

description.en:
A manga about high school kids going through the high and lows of relationships. Watch as they learn a few things about life, love, and sushi while they're at it.
___
Alt Official English Links:
- [ Kodansha USA](https://kodansha.us/series/tsuredure-children/)
- [azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/tsuredure-children)
description.pt-br: Uma série 4-koma descrevendo vários cenários do amor de jovens. Estes contos variam de um garoto, incapacitado por sua absoluta falta de confiança em si mesmo, não pode sequer aceitar o fato de que a garota de seus sonhos, na verdade, pediu-lhe para saírem em uma encontro, até uma garota quase psicótica que derrama o próprio sangue em seu chocolate caseiro, a fim de ganhar o coração de seu amado.

title.en: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Clayman Revenge

altTitles.ja: 転生したらスライムだった件: クレイマン Revenge

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Clayman's Revenge

altTitles.ru: О моём перерождении в слизь: Месть Клеймана

altTitles.ar: ذلك الوقت الذي تجسد فيه كسلايم: انتقام كلايمان

altTitles.tr: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Clayman'in İntikamı

altTitles.uk: Про моє переродження в слиз: Помста Клеймана

description.en: Walpurgis ended with echoes of a public condemnation. It seems as if a clown's dream has already ran its course. But as if fate was pranking, or the world has other plans, the  supposedly dead Clayman has been resurrected from the dead. Is it the beginning of his dark era once more...?
description.ja: ワルプルギスに響き渡った断末魔。道化の夢は一度は尽きたかと思われた。しかし運命のイタズラか、世界の選択か、死んだはずのクレイマンは復活し、再び暗躍を始め･･･る？
description.es-la:
Este Manga Spinoff es una historia alternativa que sucede luego de los eventos del Volumen 6 de la Novela Ligera.

Historia alternativa que continua despues de los eventos del Volumen 6 de la Novela Ligera. - El Walpurgis habia terminado con el grito de su muerte. Parecia que el sueño del arlequin habia llegado a su fin. Sin embargo, ya sea por una broma del destino o una decisión del mundo, Clayman quien supuestamente murio, ha resucitado una vez mas. ¿Es el comienzo de una nueva era oscura...?

altTitles.en: Noa is My Senior, and My Friend.

description.cv:
Ҫитӗннӗ ҫыннӑн хурлӑ та тертлӗ пурнӑҫӗнче «туссем» кирлӗ.

Вӑйӑ кумппанийӗнче пулса пыракан халап хӑйӗн ӗҫӗнче тата ҫынсем хутшӑнвӗнче «виҫеллӗ» 23 ҫулти Уччукка Риххиттӑвӗ тата хӑйӗн ӗҫӗнче пӗтӗм вӑй паракан ӗҫчен 27 ҫулти Савуттуме Нуви тавра ҫаврӑнса тӑрать. Икӗ сӑнар, вӗсен пурнӑҫӗсем пӗр-пӗринпе ҫыхӑнмалла мар пек пулсан та, «туссем» пулса тӑраҫҫӗ...
Ҫапла пуҫланать те кӑшт ҫепӗҫ те кӑшт йывӑр ӳххисри «туссен» камичӗ!
description.en:
A bitter and painful adult's life needs "friends".  Set in a game company, Rihito Otsuka (23), who is your everyday salaryman, and Noa Saotome (27), the ultimate career woman. Two characters whose lives aren't supposed to intersect become "friends" by chance.  A little sweet and slightly heavy office "friends" comedy begins!

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.ja:
苦くて辛いオトナの人生にこそ、“ともだち”が必要だ。ゲーム会社を舞台に、仕事も人付き合いも“ほどほど”が身上の「平熱さとり系」大塚理人(23)と、何事にも全力すぎる「限界バリキャリ」早乙女望愛(27)。交わらないキャラのふたりが、ひょんなことから「友達」に…？　少し甘くて若干重めな「オフィス”ともだち”コメディ」スタート！

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.ru:
«Друзья» необходимы в горькой и мучительной жизни взрослого человека.

История, происходящая в игровой компании, разворачивается вокруг Рихито Оцуки (23 года), который «умерен» в своей работе и социальных взаимодействиях, и Ноа Саотомэ (27 лет), карьеристки, которая выкладывается на полную во всём, что делает. И эти два непересекающихся характера случайно становятся «друзьями»?.. И так начинается немного сладкая и тяжеловатая «офисно-дружеская» комедия!

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.es-la:
La vida amarga y dolorosa de los adultos necesita amistades. Ambientado en una compañía de videojuegos, Rihito Otsuka, un oficinista de 23 años. Que es normal socializando y trabajando. Y Noa Saotome de 27, que lo da todo en todo lo que hace. Dos personaje que a priori no encajan... ¿Pueden ser amigos por casualidad? 
¡Comienza una dulce y pequeña pero pesada comedia sobre amigos de oficina!

title.en: The Fake Saintess Awaits Her Exit

altTitles.en: The Fake Saint Wants To Leave

description.en:
I possessed the body of Yvelina, a fallen saintess from a romance novel I read before I died.

I’m a fake saintess who’s about to be burned at the stake.
I can’t die like this.
Until the real saintess appears, I must fix my relationships with the male leads and change the future.

But…

“You want to continue living in this body, don’t you? If so, then go f*ck a man.”

Will I… really be able to survive here?

title.en: The Young Emperor is Obsessed With Me

altTitles.en: An Emperor 1000 Years Younger Than Me is Obsessed

altTitles.es-la: El Emperador Más Joven Qué Yo Terminó Obsesionado Conmigo

altTitles.en: The Emperor, A Thousand Years Younger Than Me, Is Obsessed

description.en: A thousand-year plan was ruined by a beautiful boy raised in the forest. In the end, Ariel abandoned the boy. 10 years later. That same boy, Cedric, who harbored a grudge for being abandoned, invades the forest. And Cedric, in the midst of the blazing fire that burns the forest, "Let's get married, Ariel." He proposed. Ariel, age-1000+ , occupation-great wizard. I guess... I need to rewrite my life plan?!

title.en: The Cup of Vengeance Is in Your Hands

description.en: Princess Eudith’s story begins when her cruel brother, the king, sells her off to the neighboring kingdom to marry the queen’s powerless stepson, Prince Franz. Eudith becomes a pawn in the queen’s plot to discredit Franz and place her biological son, Krald, on the throne. Desperate, Eudith attempts to end her misery but wakes up on the day of her fateful journey. Armed with knowledge and experience from her past life, Eudith seizes the chance for revenge by helping Prince Franz take his rightful place on the throne. Will Eudith succeed in her revenge and find happiness?

'Sonidor', a dream artisan who enters into other people's dreams through physical contact and grants wishes that could not be fulfilled in reality. One day, the emperor suddenly arrives at the house and asks to wake up the crown prince who has fallen into eternal sleep. "I want you to wake him up."

Sonidor enters the dream of 'Marmel', the crown prince who is praised by everyone for his gentle nature and beautiful appearance, but somehow Marmel's dream is gloomy and desolate. “You were just going to kill me?!” 

According to the taste of the prince who hates people, Sonidor turns into various animals and finds the reason why Marmel fell asleep one by one, and Marmel gradually opens his heart to Sonidor... "Your Highness, do you believe me?" Will Sonidor be able to wake Marmel from his eternal sleep?
description.pl: "Będę trzymać jego ręce, by obudzić go z wiecznego snu"  Sodinor, ekspert do spraw snów, ma umiejętność spełnienia marzeń nawet w świecie snów. Na rozkaz cesarza została wprowadzona do snu księcia Marmella, który nie mógł się obudzić.  Jednak w snach księcia, który znany jest ze swojej dobroci i łagodności, jest coś bardzo dziwnego. Jego kraina marzeń jest opuszona i bezbarwna.   Sonidor infiltrując sny Marmella pod postacią uroczego zwierzątka udaje się znaleźć powód jego długiego letargu...  Czy Marmell obudzi się w końcu z wiecznego snu?

altTitles.th: บุปผารุ่มราคะ

description.en: Na Hae-soo's life unravels when her husband betrays her with an affair, leaving her burdened with debt and losing their child. In a devastating blow, she witnesses him with a younger woman. Broken and despondent, Na Hae-soo feels her life crumbling around her. However, a mysterious young man unexpectedly enters her life, asking to be taught about adult love. His vulnerability and sincerity begin to stir emotions within Na Hae-soo, challenging her to reconsider her path forward.
description.fr: La vie de Na Hae-soo se désintègre lorsque son mari la trahit en ayant une liaison, la laissant accablée de dettes et perdant leur enfant. Dans un coup dévastateur, elle le surprend avec une femme plus jeune. Brisée et désespérée, Na Hae-soo sent sa vie s'effondrer autour d'elle. Cependant, un jeune homme mystérieux entre soudainement dans sa vie, lui demandant de lui enseigner l'amour adulte. Sa vulnérabilité et sa sincérité commencent à éveiller des émotions en Na Hae-soo, l'incitant à reconsidérer son chemin vers l'avenir.
description.id: Kehidupan Na Haesoo berubah ketika suaminya mengkhianatinya dengan berselingkuh, membuatnya terlilit hutang dan kehilangan anak mereka. Setelah itu, ia mendapati suaminya bersama seorang wanita yang lebih muda. Dengan perasaan hancur dan putus asa, Na Haesoo merasa kehidupannya di sekelilingnya runtuh dan hancur. Namun, seorang pemuda misterius tiba-tiba memasuki hidupnya, Beom Taeha, yang meminta untuk diajari tentang cinta orang dewasa. Keluguan dan ketulusannya mulai mengusik emosi dalam diri Na Haesoo, dan menantangnya untuk mempertimbangkan kembali langkah apa yang akan diambil.
description.pl:
Mój mąż miał romans.
Nie wystarczy wziąć na siebie mnóstwo długów, stracić dziecko, na moich oczach zmieszałam się z bardzo młodą kobietą. Zranione życie usychało bez żadnego wyglądu.
"Pokarz mi miłość dorosłego" - podejrzany młodszy mężczyzna, który wtargnął w życie Na Haesoo.
Niebezpieczny i posłuszny, zaczyna potrząsać Na Haesoo.
description.pt-br: A vida de Na Hae-soo se desfaz quando seu marido a trai. Como se não bastasse estar endividada e ter perdido um filho… Em um golpe devastador, ela o flagra fazendo sexo com uma mulher bem mais jovem do que ela. Quebrada e desanimada, Na Hae-soo sente sua vida desmoronando ao seu redor.  No entanto, um jovem misterioso inesperadamente entra em sua vida, pedindo para ser ensinado sobre o amor adulto. Sua vulnerabilidade e sinceridade começam a despertar emoções em Na Hae-soo, desafiando-a a reconsiderar seu caminho a seguir.

description.en:
there's an old legend in Sereong's family: their flute 'Manpa' will turn into a person if you care for it with enough love! But Sereong doesn't believe in this legend and plans to sell Manpa.... But it was then when Manpa turns into a human and tells Sereong he can grant her wish.

A romance between one who grants miracles and one who doesn't believe in miracles.

altTitles.zh-ro: Sanguozhi Qunxiongzhuan: Huo Feng Liao Yuan

altTitles.zh-hk: 三国志群雄伝火鳳燎原

altTitles.de: The Ravages of Time: Die Geschichte der Drei Reiche

description.en:
Nearly 2000 years ago, the prosperous Han dynasty of China collapsed. Heroes rose and fell, and three nations emerged–Wei, Shu, and Wu. Historians refer to this period as the Three Kingdoms period. The romance of the three kingdoms is an intriguing tale of heroic deeds, of alliance forged and broken, of loyalty and betrayal.  
  
Hong Kong artist Chan Mou retells this classic tale in "The Ravages of Time" from the perspective of the Sima clan, which in the end united the three kingdoms. Readers will be attracted by an array of well-developed characters and Chan Mou's own unique top-notch art-style. Whether you have played Dynasty Warriors or not, this is definitely worth a read!
description.vi:
Truyện kể về thời kỳ Tam quốc tranh bá nổi tiếng trong lịch sử Trung Quốc. Điểm đặc biệt ở đây là nhân vật trung tâm của truyện không phải là Tào Tháo, Lưu Bị hay Tôn Quyền như ta thường thấy ở các bộ truyện nói về thời kì này mà là Tư Mã Ý - người mà sau này đã cùng với gia tộc mình đánh bại tất cả các anh hùng khác, gom thiên hạ về thành 1 mối, chấm dứt 1 thời kỳ dài loạn lạc. 

Truyện mở đầu bằng cơn ác mộng mà Tư Mã Ý vẫn thường gặp: 1 người đàn ông trên ngai vàng phế truất ngôi vị của hoàng đế, bên ngoài bất chấp đám đông binh lính bao vây tấn công cùng bao nhiêu thương tích mà 1 người bình thường không thể chịu đựng nổi, tên tù vượt ngục vẫn bước từng bước từng bước một vào điện đòi món nợ máu với người đàn ông đó. Đó chỉ là cơn ác mộng hay là 1 điềm báo? Không ai nói được kể cả Tư Mã Ý.

Nhưng cũng có ai có thời gian để quan tâm đến truyện ấy trong thời loạn lạc này chứ. Dù cố né tránh, cuối cùng dòng họ Tư Mã cũng phải bước vào vòng xoáy chiến tranh, và sự xuất hiện của họ đã làm thay đổi cả dòng lịch sử....

altTitles.en: My Body Has Been Possessed by Someone
Someone Possessed My Body for Ten Years
Someone Possessed My Body For 10 Years

description.en: Seven years ago, Kanna was thrown into the body of a Korean girl named Joohwa. She had everything in her new life—a loving family, a great boyfriend, a hard-won medical license, even her own clinic! But that all changes when she's suddenly swapped back one day. Just as she's been in Joohwa's body, Joohwa has been in hers... and she's left Kanna's life a mess! First things first, she's going to divorce her cold husband, Duke Silvian Valentino. After that? Revenge on everyone who's wronged her.
description.pt-br:
“Me ouça. Sou o único com quem você pode contar.”

“....”

“Eu sou o único para você.”

“....”

“Apenas eu.”

Mas que desilusão abominável. Por mais de 10 anos, meu corpo foi possuído por outro alguém. Teria sido bom se “essa pessoa” usasse meu corpo e o devolvesse em boas condições, mas ela ainda se casou estando no meu corpo, ela também estava perseguindo meu marido como uma stalker...?

“Primeiro vamos nos divorciar.”

Eu tentei começar uma nova vida deixando meu marido, que estava me tratando como lixo e a minha família que me tratava como sujeira. Mas...

“Indo embora? Você vai me deixar?” —Meu marido que não acreditava em mim.

“Por que você está ficando do lado dele, Irmã?" —Um irmão mais novo que repentinamente estava com ciúmes.

“Fique nessa casa. Você não pode ir a lugar algum.” —Até mesmo o meu pai que me odiava o tempo todo estava repentinamente obcecado?

O que estava errado com eles para agirem assim tão de repente?

description.en:
Sexual violence tag is for chapter 1 only.

The setting is the year 202X, in Kamata, Ota Ward, Tokyo, which has become one of the world's leading entertainment districts due to the opening of the Kamata Line. The area attracts huge economic benefits and is surrounded by organized crime, foreign mafias, terrorists, smugglers, prostitution rings... and the hidden agendas of political, financial, and governmental power players. A newly assigned police officer, Nonogami, stationed at the station's front police box, feels despair over the corruption of power. However, with the overwhelming violence of "Tyranno," a massive female police officer, the cases begin to be solved.
description.ja: 舞台は202X年、蒲蒲線の開通により世界有数の歓楽街となった東京大田区蒲田。 巨額の経済効果と利権に群がる反社会勢力・外国人マフィア・テロリスト、密売人、売春組織…そして政財官の黒幕の思惑…駅前の交番に赴任した新任警察官・野々上は権力の腐敗に絶望するが、「ティラノ」と呼ばれる巨躯の女性警官の圧倒的な暴力によって事件を解決していく。

description.en:
1855: During the political upheavals and social strife at the end of the Tokugawa Shogunate in Japan, 
the two orphan brothers Shoutarou and Gentarou Yukimura struggle to survive in these turbulent times. 
Their only possession being their deceased father's sword and clinging onto their mother's final words of wisdom, 
the brothers seek to embark on the Path of the Warrior: Sidooh.
description.pl:
Podczas przewrotów politycznych i konfliktów społecznych pod koniec szogunatu Tokugawa w Japonii (1855), dwóch osieroconych braci Yukimura: Shoutarou i Gentarou walczy o przetrwanie. Ich bronią i bogactwem jest miecz zmarłego ojca, a siłą i nadzieją – mądrość ostatnich słów matki.  
 buzzybuzz - 5 sierpnia 2010
description.pt-br: Durante as convulsões políticas e conflitos sociais no final do shogunato Tokugawa no Japão (1855), dois irmãos Yukimura Shoutarou e Yukimura Gentarou lutam para sobreviver nestes tempos turbulentos. Com sua única posse  uma espada de seu pai falecido e agarrando a sabedoria das palavras finais de sua mãe, os irmãos pretendem embarcar no Caminho do Guerreiro: Sidooh.

description.en:
Li Jian, the adopted son of a mob boss, has been forcefully locked up in a cemetery by Min Zhao, the son of a deranged killer.

“Are you after some ransom money? Just call my wife, she’ll pay whatever you ask.”

 “To the rest of the world, you’re already dead. I can do whatever I want with you.” 

Li Jian raised his hands and struck Min Zhao’s injury. Wincing in pain, Min Zhao retaliated by slapping Li Jian across the face.

“Do you really hate me this much? I saved your life, and this is how you thank me?”

“Do you expect me to be grateful, you psycho?!” Li Jian fires back.

“No matter what, you’re not leaving me. You’re safer here.”

Secretary Seo Yujin is in charge of self proclaimed truth-finding. Once upon she receives a sudden call to her president and she hears shocking news. She is asked to take full care of the president's younger brother and the third son of an unknown conglomerate, Jin Taeoh. What if you add something like this when you can't shake off an eery feeling? "It's not that difficult. You just need to keep him out of the media."

She should have run away immediately after hearing that, but blinded by the money, Seo Yujin agrees...! The first time she goes to the airport to meet him her first impression was that he's a quite beautiful... beast? Tame the world's just but heartless psychotic beast who doesn't know where to go!

Having never done anything bad and lived a dilligent life, Shushu is suddenly framed for murder and imprisoned in a prison for women.
In order to survive amongst harsh and vicious criminals.

“W-Will you be my prison wife?”

She becomes the wife of her very pretty but very scary roommate, who is also the prettiest(?) girl in the prison, Minicat.

But something is weird.

Why is she suddenly having the kind of feelings she would have for a man for this beautiful Minicat instead?

“It’s a rule, cabbage. Close your eyes when we kiss and I’ll treat you nicely.”

Mizumura Shinta didn’t know what to make of the situation when the sexiest girl in school, Kishimoto Ririsu, starts seducing him and things get extremely physical. Shinta isn’t rich or the popular guy in school so it doesn’t make sense that Ririsu would be so interested in him. But Ririsu is in fact a vampire, a secret that she will kill to keep hidden. As the relationship between Shinta and Ririsu grows, it gets harder for her to keep the secret hidden. And when those close to him, like his semi-romantic childhood friend Makimura Chizuru, are involuntarily thrown into the chaos, deep dark secrets get revealed.
description.ja: 「中出しのセッ●スって…超気持ちイイんだよ？」童貞の俺がハーフの女の子から、いきなり中出しを強要され!?　東京の某ミッション系短大に通う主人公の心太は、平穏且つ平凡な毎日を過ごしていた。そんなある日、学園に転入してきた謎のハーフ美少女リリスとの出会いにより彼の生活は大きく変化する…。理由もわからぬまま、突然リリスから濃厚なキスをされ、熱くなった股間を強く上下に動かされ…。「私が妊娠しちゃうくらい…キミの精子、たっぷり注ぎ込んで…？」心太を誘惑するリリスの本当の思惑とは…。

description.fr: Tomber amoureux devrait être une expérience excitante... mais pas pour Hari ! Notre héroïne est maudite par l'amour non réciproque, et Yura compte bien en profiter. Hari réussira-t-elle à avouer ses sentiments à son premier amour, ou se laissera-t-elle emporter par les complications de cet amour non partagé ? Son histoire d'amour passionnante est sur le point de commencer.
description.ko:
사랑에 빠지면 짜릿하다는데… 그래도 이건 아니잖아! 
짝사랑으로 인해 저주에 걸려버린 하리와 그 저주를 빌려달라는 유라.
하리는 과연 짝남 정원에게 고백할 것인가? 아니면 짝사랑을 포기할 것인가?
짜릿짜릿 하리의 첫사랑 전기 시작!

description.en: Sendo Chihiro, a high school girl, moves from Tokyo to the provincial island of Hanayama after her parents' divorce. There's something strange about the island she moves to. There is blatant discrimination against outsiders, mysterious rituals that suddenly take place, and a huge "water tower" built in the middle of the island... One day, a fisherman is stabbed to death in his home. The whole island becomes suspicious of the murderer, and the unexpected culprit is revealed...
description.ja: 離島「花山島」に東京からやってきた女子高生、千堂千尋。独自の風俗が残るその島で、人の欲望が暴走する事件が起き始める。殺人、放火、強姦…‥際限ない欲望が離島を地獄に変えていく――。

description.en: Do you ever wonder what the most popular boy at school is really like? As it turns out, he might be just as awkward and shy as any of us. That’s what wallflower Jayu Nam begins to discover after a chance encounter with Jahyeok Yeo, a boy in her class who seems to excel at everything in life. Well, almost. Underneath Jahyeok’s persona is a secret super-introvert who would rather just stay home, except his charming good looks keep forcing him into social situations. Together, Jayu and Jahyeok begin to learn a little something about friendship and maybe more…
description.pt-br: Você já se perguntou como é, de verdade, o garoto mais popular da escola? Acontece que ele pode ser tão desajeitado e tímido quanto qualquer um de nós. É o que Jayu Nam, uma garota discreta e reservada, começa a perceber depois de um encontro inesperado com Jahyeok Yeo, um colega de classe que parece ser bom em tudo na vida. Bem, quase tudo. Por trás do carisma de Jahyeok, esconde-se um super-introvertido que preferiria ficar em casa, mas sua aparência cativante sempre o empurra para situações sociais. Juntos, Jayu e Jahyeok começam a aprender um pouco sobre amizade e, quem sabe, algo mais…

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

altTitles.es-la: Un Mundo Donde 1 Hombre cada 39 Mujeres es lo Normal
El mundo paralelo con una relación de hombres y mujeres de 1:39 resulta ser inesperadamente normal

description.en:
Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

---

Alternative version: [A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal 【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/dcf01405-2bb3-40a4-bd8b-af1eb90c8e8e)
description.ja: 主人公「佐藤 蒼」はひょんなことから男女比1：39の平行世界の自分と入れ替わってしまう。入れ変わった先には、優しい家族や可愛い女性ばかりそんな彼女たちの外面を見て主人公は「男女の数が変化しただけで他はそんなに変わらないな」と安心する。だが、彼女たちの内面では葛藤や煩悩に溢れかえっていた。
description.es-la: Sou Satou, un chico de secundaria que fue transportado a un mundo paralelo. Este mundo resulta ser que la relación de hombres y mujeres es de 1:39, esto quiere decir que por cada 1 hombre en el mundo hay 39 mujeres, sin embargo, parece ser que este nuevo mundo resulta ser inesperadamente ¿normal?...

description.en: A Keio College (top notch Tokyo college) exam candidate, Touma Inaba, is interupted when a cute young girl, Urara Kasuga, arrives at his hotel room door. She later turns out to be his cousin who he barely remembers from his childhood. Urara, who had felt something special for him (an other-than-cousinly-love), invites Touma to live with her since he has no place to stay other than the hotel room. Before taking the test, Touma meets Meiko Yotsuba, a beautiful, sophisticated woman also trying to get into Keio. Meiko gets into Keio but Touma does not, due to a cold Urara had given him shortly before. Although he did not make it, he pretends he does to earn the respect of Meiko. Touma is caught up in a love triangle with Urara and Meiko, while struggling to keep Meiko believing he's really a Keio student and still be there for Urara at the same time.

title.en: From Bureaucrat to Villainess: Dad's Been Reincarnated!

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢転生おじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Reincarnated as a Villainess

altTitles.ru: Перерождение Мужчины Средних Лет в Дочь Дворянина

altTitles.vi: Ông chú chuyển sinh thành nữ phụ phản diện

altTitles.es-la: El Viejo que Reencarno como la Villana

description.en:
After a traffic accident, 52-year-old civil servant Kenzaburou Tondabayashi awakens to find he's become Grace Auvergne, a duke's daughter, and more importantly the villainess of an otome game. Not wanting to get in the way of the happy endings of the young characters around him, Grace sets out to play the role of the villain, but whether it's due to Kenzaburou's memories of being an affectionate parent getting in the way or not being able to remember those pesky foreign names properly, it ends up being a lot harder than it looks…
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/48434)
**Official English:** [emaqi](https://emaqi.com/manga/from-bureaucrat-to-villainess-dad-s-been-reincarnated) - United States & Canada only!
description.id:
Setelah mengalami sebuah kecelakaan, seorang PNS berusia 52 tahun bernama kenzaburou tondabayashi tiba-tiba berada di tubuh seorang putri duke yang bernama grace auvergne, terlebih lagi, grace merupakan seorang villainess di sebuah game otome. Tidak ingin mengganggu happy ending anak-anak muda yang ada di dekatnya, grace memutuskan untuk menjalankan perannya sebagai seorang villainess, tapi mungkin karena ingatan kenzaburou yang dulunya merupakan seorang orang tua yang penuh kasih sayang atau karena tidak bisa mengingat nama-nama asing, akhirnya setiap grace ingin menjalankan peran villainessnya, grace selalu terganggu.
Sehingga dia merasa menjadi seorang villainess ternyata lebih sulit dari yang dia pikirkan...
description.ja: 52歳の真面目な公務員・屯田林憲三郎は交通事故に遭う。気が付いたらそこは学園舞台の乙女ゲームのような世界…しかも校内一高飛車なオーヴェルヌ侯爵家の令嬢グレイスに転生してしまい!?
description.es-la: Tras perder el conocimiento, después de realizar un acto heroico, el oficinista de 52 años, Kenzaburou Tondabayashi, despertó como Grace Auvergne, la hija de un duque perteneciente a un juego Otome y a su vez la villana de la historia. En un afán de querer cumplir su rol como villana para no afectar la historia del mundo, verá cómo su carácter de padre amoroso y de persona amable harán que su objetivo sea más difícil de lo que esperaba...

description.en: Annette Rosenberg, a descendant of the Padanian royal family and the only daughter of a military captain. After two years of dating, she married her father’s faithful servant, Heiner Valdemar. Everything was perfect. Until her family fell due to her husband’s betrayal. “You will be unhappy by my side for the rest of your life.” Annette suddenly realized something. This man’s revenge is just beginning.

altTitles.th: นาริห้องตรงข้าม

description.en: Suddenly one day my peaceful daily life was broken by that person.. She is a beautiful girl? And she says she likes me? "No, I love you..." The problem is, I don't hate that person who moved to the house next door in order to marry me.

If you love someone, what kind of things might you do? The desire to destroy even while in love, the dilemma of wanting to ruin a love that grows deeper. This is a deeply probing collection of high-stimulation romance short stories titled Moonstruck, exploring how dangerous the emotion of love can sometimes be.

The death of an Ayakashi is unclean - It is an impure occurence that corrodes the land, and occasionally gives birth to monsters. This is the story of the "Ayakashi undertakers" who exorcise these impurities and watch over the deaths of these fantastical beings.
description.ja: あやかしの死を見つめる追悼奇譚開幕。あやかしの死に、穢れあり。それは土地を蝕み、時に化け者を生む、妖しき死の名残り…。あやかし殺しの罪人・八重波は、穢れを祓う葬儀屋の元で働くこととなり…。人とあやかし、生者と死者。
